bibl.title: KÊrie, d°spota, domine. Greek Politeness in the Roman Empire
bibl.note: The study is based on documentary papyri and literary evidence (particularly that of the Septuagint and New Testament). - [Introduction.] - Domine. - D°spota. - KÊrie. - Later Centuries. - Solutions. <kurie, despota>
bibl.seg: DICKEY Eleanor, KÊrie, d°spota, domine. Greek Politeness in the Roman Empire. Avec résumé en anglais. <kurie, despota>
